title: On Massive Mixed Symmetry Tensor Fields in Minkowski Space and (A)dS
abstract:
In this paper we give explicit gauge invariant Lagrangian formulation for massive theories based on mixed symmetry tensors \Phi_{[\mu
u],\alpha}, T_{[\mu
u\alpha], eta} and R_{[\mu
u],[\alpha eta]} both in Minkowski as well as in (Anti) de Sitter spaces. In particular, we study all possible massless and partially massless limits for such theories in (A)dS.
